title: The Power of Intention - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/1/21
itunes:title: The Power of Intention - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/1/21
description:
George Noory and author Lynne McTaggart explore her work with intention experiments, measuring the ability of groups of people to change events and improve human relations simply by the power of their thoughts.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
